EmailTemplate.name: Module Accomplished
EmailTemplate.subject: Congrats - module accomplished
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!FieloELR__ModuleResponse__c.FieloELR__Member__r.Name},
Congratulations, you’ve reached your required grade on module {!FieloELR__ModuleResponse__c.FieloELR__Module__r.Name} and can move on to the next module. You’re really beginning to stand out in the crowd.
You’re also one step closer to completing the course, and earning valuable points. These points can be redeemed for a whole host of different rewards in our unique rewards catalog.
Keep going!
Best wishes,
<Company Name>
